name: CHUBS: Junk Food Run
description:
It's time to EAT!!! and CHUBS is on a junk food run.
Help CHUBS eat all the junk food he can eat, but watch out for the "good stuff" and his enemies "The muscle heads" or you'll trip and fall and have to start over. Eat the big donuts for a sugar rush.

Watch The Obstacles:
Carrots
Broccoli
"The Muscle Heads"
etc...

Only eat the junk food, including the BIG Donut (for a sugar rush)

P.S. CHUBS eats a lot of junk food, so he tends to be, well "gassy"

How far can you get?!
